inputs.description: -surfset mydset.gii  surface dataset onto which to map thickness (probably a pial/gray matter surface)
inputs.name: SURFSET

inputs.description: -outdir thick_base output directory basename. The output will be placed in a directory with thick_base in its name: mmmm_bb, mmmm_erode, mmmm_in2out  Other options:  takes all options from the three @measure_... scripts  Output: see Output section of help for each of the method scripts This script produces a quick visualization script to see thickness maps in suma for all three methods See related scripts and programs for computing thickness: @measure_erosion_thick, @measure_in2out, @measure_bb_thick and SurfMeasures
inputs.name: OUTDIR
